cards.markdown:
This is a new version of my training notes. Rather than the usual PDFs and eBooks I create, I’ve built this as a series of webpages that I can continually update. This field is changing so fast that just putting up a set of static files will render them obsolete too quickly. So, please bookmark this page for future reference — and check back periodically, to see what’s been added. ##Social Video is NOT TV Because this is what TV is: ###Course Slides

Creating Social Video from Adam Tinworth
